attributes.action: Declare the result of the 2016 referendum unsafe.
attributes.background: In view of the Electoral Commission findings and fines imposed the result of the referendum cannot be relied on. Many facts are still unknown, but the amount of doubt in the process makes it unwise to refer to the result as the "Will of the People"

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. In particular, we aren't sure what you would like to happen as a result of the Government deciding the result was unsafe.

If you would like the Government to revoke Article 50 you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241584

If you would like a public inquiry into the conduct of the 2016 referendum you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/250178
